QuantDabg.cpp File Reference

Class for doing Detected Above BackGround (DABG) analysis. Idea is to use the intensity of probes in a probeset to calculate a p-value for the entire probeset. The individual intensities are compared to a set of background probes. More...

#include "chipstream/QuantDabg.h"
#include "portability/affy-base-types.h"
#include "util/Util.h"
#include "util/Verbose.h"
#include "util/md5sum.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Class for doing Detected Above BackGround (DABG) analysis. Idea is to use the intensity of probes in a probeset to calculate a p-value for the entire probeset. The individual intensities are compared to a set of background probes.
